reviewText: Imagine if you had a favorite actress you wanted to see in the buff but you didn't care for the movie she played in. So you don't get to fulfill your dream. But, what if some one comes along and clips out the one special scene amd puts it on a dvd and offers it for sale. Would you buy it? What if a lot of your favorite actresses with those special scenes are on one dvd? Would you buy that? The Celebrity Nude Review,The Saucy 70's is just the ticket. The great thing about this set up is that some of the movies the scenes came from are either not available or very costly. In some cases it's the only time the actress did a nude scene. In each presentation a little history of the actress is presented before the scene. In some cases Citrus Cinema didn't have much to work with in other cases they had a lot. There are some supprises. Suzanne Somers doing a pool scene in her only booby nudie. They bounce up and down pretty good. Sally Struthers?There is so much movement between her and Jasck Nicholson that even in frame to frame slow motion there is nothing but a blur,but patience you finally get to see them. Ursula Andress, full frontal. Angie Dickison, full frontal. Melanie Griffith,you've got to slow this one down but a great boob shot. The cutest of them all Marie Liljedahl,full frontal and behind as well. The list goes on. Some of the actresses I didn't know but they looked good anyway. The only porn shot was Marie Forsa who was shoving diamonds up her love nest and it wasn't even her scene. Not all was perfect. Farrah Fawcett, you only get half a boob shot. Goldie Hawn was naked but only a side shot through two sheer curtains. Lesly Ann Warren only a glimpse and that's if you slow the frame sequence down. But still! How many have seen Wonder Woman,Lynda Carter, in the buff?Hellen Mirren when she was young. There's a pair for you. The list goes on. Cybil Sheppard, Jane Fonda, Beverly D'Angelo,Sara Miles,Britt Eklund,and many more and you don't even have to buy their movies to see the good stuff. Citrus Cinema has done that for you. Great idea. Now if Amazon would also carry Citrus Cinema's Sleazy Sixtie's,Easy Eightie's,Naughty Ninetie's that would be even better. If you're a connoisseur of famous actresse's boobs from the seventie's don't pass this one up.
A view from the past, of actresses known for other roles, where some should have stayed sexy in our imaginations.

First and foremost, I picked this DVD up because I have a thing for Lynda Carter. I was pleasantly surprised to see her nude in 'Bobbie Jo & The Outlaw', a very rare film and I was not disappointed. But I was most impressed at the quantity of quality film clips of nude scenes from some very obscure, long-forgotten films. Now I'm on this obsessed quest to find all these films for my collection, especially the ones with a young Helen Mirren amd Phyllis Davis.

This DVD has opened my eyes to numerous actresses that I had no idea about. And seeing them all nude, many of them in their first-ever nude scene was a blast.

Aside from the clips, this film has great bios on each star that is accented with controversial facts which I found really cool. The music accompanying the clips is cool 70's jazz-funk-porn music. Now, I am searching all over for some of this stuff. Great purchase.

This is a very comprehensive Revue of actresses who have been daring enough to disrobe in the name of art and culture.  It gives us a very good view of actresses who are now older and or more mature and who are still making Studio movies, TV shows, doing work on Cable and making Independent films as well.  The female nude is a true art form and we are fortunate that we have women who wish to share their canvas with us.  The late 1960's and 1970's gave us a generation of bold women who made their own free and innovative choices in life.  To see these women in their early incarnations and also still having them on the current and contemporary landscape is a breath of fresh air, from the false, cheap, tawdry and mindless displays we see from the so-called "celebrities" of these over-hyped and over-marketed times.

Enjoyed the dvd came in perfect shape and recommend to other movie celebrity fans. Have been a fan of Ann Margret since teen years. Glad to see she made her choice of what to show and not show. Real beauty.

Nudity in movies in the 60's was rare but more common in the 70's. Even in the 70's it was a big deal for an actress to bare her boobies or butt. This is a collection of actresses who were brave enough to show some skin in their films. This is nice assortment.

I personally and thoroughly enjoyed this collection of films on one dvd. I have watched the film several times and can still see myself watching it more and more as time go's on. I purchased the Easy 80's edition in expectation the same dialogue and structure was too be expected, and I was disapointed. Now that I have had a chance to compare the Saucy 70's format to the Easy 80's edition, You Will Not Be Disapointed in the Saucy 70's. The Saucy 70's dvd has a narrator who guides you all throughout the program talking about each scene, actress, and which movie the clip was taken from. Whereas the Easy 80's has no narrator, text only, and the same 6-8 cheesy themed songs played like a broken record. Easy 80's has no creativity, yet Saucy 70's was my first choice and remains my recomended choice to others who show interest in these films.

Unfortunately, it costs me shipping 2 separate times- I have returned it twice,& have asked Amazon to view the new disc to make sure that there is data on disc. Amazon is an amazing site, and I order 90% of my merchandise from them, its just that there is something wrong with at least 2 of the Saucy 70s volume 1 and 2-especially volume 2. Could someone look into this matter for me? Thanks-I would appreciate it. Sincerely, Richard Epley. e-mail at richardepley33@yahoo.com

If you saw any of the movies these clips are from don't waste your money on this video. They make no sense outside of the context of the film and considered next to todays standards (or lack thereof) the "titallating" factor is almost non-existent. Apparently our memories become romantically foggy as the years go by and we attribute more to these "Saucy Revues" than there really was. My advice is to let your memories remain just that - memories - and don't try to conjure up the past and expect the same results...as a great writer once wrote -"You can't go home again".

FARRAH FAWCETT- THE FIRST ON THE LIST OF PEOPLE FEATURED DOESNT GET NUDE. AND CANDY SAMPLES, WHO TO MY KNOWLEDGE WAS ONLY EVER A PORN STAR. WHO HASNT SEEN HER NUDE? COMPLETE JOKE. IN FAIRNESS- THERE WAS A WINNER OR TWO. SALLY STRUTHERS WHILE SHE WAS STILL THIN COMES TO MIND. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS TO YOUNGER PEOPLE WHO MAY NEVER HAVE SEEN THE MOVIES FROM WHICH THESE CLIPS HAVE BEEN TAKEN. AT THE END OF THE DAY- YOU HAFTA DECIDE HOW MUCH YOU WANNA PAY FOR A COLLECTION OF BRIEF GLIMPSES.... AND $19 TO ME IS TOO MUCH. AS WITH ALMOST EVERYTHING ON AMAZON- THE PRICE EVENTUALLY FALLS. WAIT TILL IT DROPS BELOW $10 OR SO AND THEN TAKE A LOOK.

This is quite possibly the worst DVD of all time. To say I was disappointed is a huge under statement. It's supposed to be full of nudity, yet there was barely any at all. The price of $19.95 is about $19.90 overpriced.

I imagine there have been many amateur attempts to do something like this - compile the best nude scenes from scores of films. I doubt if many have achieved this level of visual quality: all the films that have been released on DVD appear here in DVD quality, and the rest, copied from videotape, as artifact-free as possible. A good job of engineering, but not the erotic experience some purchasers might be expecting. The clips are arranged by year of release, as a bunch with no chapter stops or menu access points (except for entire years). In addition, each clip is preceded by a written introduction. The effect is like reading a textbook (except the illustrations are better). On the bright side, there are some hard-to-find films represented here (e.g. Secrets, Bobbie Jo and the Outlaw, In Praise of Older Women), although the vast majority are readily available on DVD. It would have been nice to track down some more of the VHS-only releases, before all the videotape in the world becomes magnetized dust. Perhaps they will do that for subsequent releases, since this is supposed to be the first in a series.

O.K. I admit that just like most men, I'm intrigued by the idea of seeing what famous actresses look like nude.  But lately I've been giving the subject some serious thought, and it really doesn't make much sense.  After looking at the photos of these beautiful famous women, I'm suddenly struck by the realization that when naked, they look no different than non-famous women.  They don't have three breasts or more than one vagina.  And the shape and size of those beautiful parts are within the normal parameters.  So why did I spend money on a magazine of nude celebrities?  Temporary insanity, I guess.  Anyway, I hope I'm now cured...at least until I see another gorgeous actress on TV and find myself wondering how she would look nude.
